front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Testing Electric Submersible Pump Cable

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Procedures and test voltage values for factory, acceptance and maintenance testing of electric submersible pump (ESP) cable systems are presented. This recommended practice applies to cable systems rated 3 kV through 8 kV (phase to phase) and is intended only for this special-purpose cable. The intent is to provide uniform test procedures and guidelines for evaluation of the test results.
